t: Amazon.com : Ergon GP1 Mountain Bike Grips, Black/Gray, Rubber : Sports & Outdoors
s: Lesson learned, fork the money for the best and forget about it and enjoy the sport you love. Apparently, it had to do with the thickness of the rubber near the shifter that caused strain on my thumb with the other grips. These Ergon grips are truly ergonomically designed.
